name: Tally
story: Tally was born and raised in Poland. He was trained in close combat and small unit tactics by his military father. Tally served in the Polish army for several years before being discharged for disobeying a direct order. After his discharge, he began working as a freelance assassin, specializing in shotgun kills. He joined the INDEPENDENT faction because he believes in their values of independence and self-reliance.
